content: in the round work is knit flat slip markers as needed 51 abbreviations 28 k-knit bobble- bind off p-purl pm- place marker sts- stitches yo-yarn over sm- slip marker m-marker k2tog- knit 2 stitches together ssk- slip 1st stitch knitwise on left needle to right needle slip 2nd stitch purlwise from left needle onto right needle insert tip of left needle into front of the 2 slipped stitches knit these 2 stitches together for further help go to delormedesigns blogspot ca/2012/05/ssk-slip-slip-knit-new-way html megan@delormedesigns ca www delormedesigns blogspot com delorme designs
